short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting websites to stay focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay focused and boost your productivity with Focus Mode! This simple yet effective Chrome extension allows you to block distracting websites like social media and video platforms with a single click. Whether you’re working, studying, or just need to avoid distractions, Focus Mode is here to help.

Features:
Block predefined distracting websites (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, and more).
Easily enable or disable Focus Mode with one click.
Lightweight and easy to use – no complicated settings or permissions.
How It Works:
Simply click the extension icon, toggle the blocking feature, and Focus Mode will take care of the rest. You can turn off the block anytime with just one click.

Privacy Policy:
We value your privacy. Focus Mode does not collect, store, or share any user data. Learn more about our privacy practices on our Privacy Policy page.

Stay Focused Beyond the Browser:
For more tips and tools to stay productive, visit our website at https://smartmotionapp.com. Explore additional resources and insights to help you make the most of your day.
